Keywords: Animal , Asgardian , Deity , Future , Monster , Mystical , Past
Real Name: Loki Laufeyson
Special Powers
(+5 POINTS) THE TESSERACT: Loki starts the game with the Disney+ #s006 Tesseract equipped.
THERE SHOULD BE AN ALLIGATOR TANK: Charge, Flurry, Stealth.
OVERLY SENSITIVE: Blades/Claws/Fangs, Precision Strike. When Loki uses Blades/Claws/Fangs, hit characters gain Immobile until your next turn.

June 13, 2022
Oathful
Alligator Loki is very fun to both play and look at. His potential to lock down two figures and deal solid damage is great for any team he's on. Combine that with his top dial Stealth and Shape Change and you have the perfect elusive predator. Keep in mind he only has Toughness as a reducer, so he isn't going to be tanking to many hits once he does his job. If you want a really fun team, add him to your pirates team via Blackbeard since he has the Dolphin symbol, its made for some fun games. Thematic: 7/10 Viability: 8.5/10 Fun Factor: 8/10, fairly balanced figure
